pages.text: Mission Control Station can be used as link to your Space Stations. It can use Space Station to locate objects on the planets. Such like, villages, dungons, structures, ore veins...
You need to build a Space Station then get back to the planet.
In MCS GUI select your space station and type of object you want to find.
Space Station will start scanning the planet and will show you the location of the object. Closest to coordinates you've defined in MCS
